## RelationBDTO.addUserToGroup() method

Add a user to a group

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addUserToGroup(userId: string, targetGroupId: string): Promise<[boolean, boolean]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  userId | string | The id of the user |
|  targetGroupId | string | The id of the group |

Promise&lt;\[boolean, boolean\]&gt;
